collectible.title: Fur Scarf
collectible.subtitle: A wolf pelt sewn into the shape of a scarf
collectible.text: A wolf pelt sewn into the shape of a scarf. Leonie comes from a village of hunters, and thus knows how to make her own clothes from wild game. One of her possible lost items.
collectible.unlock: Finish a game where Leonie loses. (You don't need to win, she just needs to lose.)

collectible.title: Hand Drawn Map
collectible.subtitle: A practical map of the forest
collectible.text: A practical map of the forest made by Captain Jeralt. Leonie kept this as a reminder of her time as his apprentice. One of her possible lost items.
collectible.unlock: See dialogue from Leonie mentioning Jeralt, then finish the game. (At least 10 times across multiple games.)

collectible.title: Crude Arrowheads
collectible.subtitle: Rough-hewn arrowheads fashioned from rocks
collectible.text: Rough-hewn arrowheads fashioned from rocks. They belong to one who favors the bow. One of her possible lost items.
collectible.unlock: Win a game featuring Leonie after she has entered Rivalry mode. (She enters Rivalry mode when playing against multiple males.)
